name: fourtytwo
description: Texas 42 Web Game - Authentic domino game implementation

scripts.start: npm run check-prereqs && npm run setup-env && docker-compose up --build
scripts.develop: npm run check-prereqs && npm run setup-env && concurrently "docker-compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.tdd: npm run check-prereqs && npm run setup-env && concurrently "npm run test:backend:watch" "npm run test:frontend:watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend

author: Texas 42 Development Team
